name: dynamodb-data-replication
description: A Lambda script to replicate a database, backing it up in a DynamoDB table
author: SAM CLI

scripts.aws-dynamodb-init: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name beer-test --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=5,WriteCapacityUnits=5 --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000
